from sys import stdin

def main():
    n = int(stdin.readline().strip())
    a = stdin.readline().strip().split(" ")
    b = stdin.readline().strip().split(" ")
    print(" ".join(map(str, min_max_wins(n, a, b))))


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main(a, b):
    # get input
    
    # get min/max
    min_wins = 0
    max_wins = 0
    for i in range(3):
        for j in range(3):
            if i == j:
                continue
            elif (i + 1) % 3 == j:
                min_wins += min(a[i], b[j])
                max_wins += max(a[i], b[j])
            else:
                min_wins += max(a[i], b[j])
                max_wins += min(a[i], b[j])
    
    # print result
    return min_wins, max_wins

if __name__ == "__main__":
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    
    min_wins, max_wins = main(a, b)
    print(min_wins, max_wins)


from sys import stdin
from collections import Counter
from itertools import combinations

def min_max_wins(n, a, b):
    cnt_a = Counter(a)
    cnt_b = Counter(b)
    w_a = 0
    w_b = 0
    for k, v in cnt_a.items():
        if k == "R":
            w_a += min(v, cnt_b["S"])
            w_b += min(v, cnt_b["P"])
        elif k == "S":
            w_a += min(v, cnt_b["P"])
            w_b += min(v, cnt_b["R"])
        elif k == "P":
            w_a += min(v, cnt_b["R"])
            w_b += min(v, cnt_b["S"])
    return w_a, w_b

def main():
    n = int(stdin.readline().strip())
    a = stdin.readline().strip().split(" ")
    b = stdin.readline().strip().split(" ")
    print(" ".join(map(str, min_max_wins(n, a, b))))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()


def main():
    # get input
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    b = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    
    # get min/max
    min_wins = 0
    max_wins = 0
        cur_min = 0
        cur_max = 0
    for i in range(3):
        for j in range(3):
            if i == j:
                continue
            elif (i + 1) % 3 == j:
                cur_min += min(a[i], b[j])
                cur_max += max(a[i], b[j])
            else:
                cur_min += max(a[i], b[j])
                cur_max += min(a[i], b[j])
        min_wins = max(min_wins, cur_min)
        max_wins = max(max_wins, cur_max)
    
    # print result
    print(min_wins, max_wins)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
